problem.markdown:
1. Which of the following is the inversion of four bar chain?
(x) Beam engine () Pendulum pump () Oscillating cylinder () None of these
2. The links in a four bar mechanism is ?
(x) Binary link () Ternary link () Flexible link () None of these
3. Coupled wheel of locomotive is an inversion of
() Six bar mechanism (x) Four bar mechanism () Double slider crank mechanism () Slider crank mechanism
4. Beam engine is
() Double crank mechanism (x) Crank and lever mechanism () None of these () Crank and crank mechanism
5. Grashof's condition is the necessary condition for?
() Intermittent motion () Non Continuous motion () None of these (x) Continuous motion
problem.p: 1. Which of the following is the inversion of four bar chain?
2. The links in a four bar mechanism is ?
3. Coupled wheel of locomotive is an inversion of
5. Grashof's condition is the necessary condition for?
